name: Golf Hit
description:
Place the golf ball on the tee box, swing the club and strike the ball as hard as possible! Upgrade your gear to move the ball longer distance and unlock new golf equipments!

Golf Hit Features:
- Quick-fire and addictive gameplay: Tap to hit the ball as hard as you can
- Upgrade your stats to reach longer distance
- Hundreds of different balls and clubs available

The sun is shining. It’s time to play the most exciting golf like never before!
